column41: Cost data for contingent labour and consultancy are taken  from a different source for 2010-11 than for 2011-12. This means that care must be taken in making comparisons. DH is working to reconcile any differences.

Consultancy is classed as costs associated with individuals or organisations working with the business on a specific activity. Hence, the costs for consultancy work will not relate to manpower numbers. The cost figures for specialist contractors relate to a complete range of services provided to the HPA.

column1: Monitor - Independent Regulator of NHS Foundation Trusts
column41: Consultancy costs relate to a small specialist team working on the transition to the "New Monitor" and are equivalent to around £500 per day which is normal for consultancy at this level. This is a short-term activity that will not continue throughout the year.
